sentences.sContent: An adult pandas eat about 20 kilograms of fresh bamboo every day.
sentences.sContent_eng: An adult pandas eat about 20 kilograms of fresh bamboo every day.
sentences.sCn: 一只成年的大熊猫每天要吃20公斤左右的鲜竹。

sentences.sContent: His favorite fruits and vegetables as well as 55 lb. of bamboo will be on board for nourishment.
sentences.sContent_eng: His favorite fruits and vegetables as well as 55 lb. of bamboo will be on board for nourishment.
sentences.sCn: 除了它最喜爱的水果和蔬菜以外还有55磅的竹子将会作为它在飞机上的食物。

phrases.pCn: 竹幕（西方资产阶级舆论界过去对我国的诬蔑性用语）

remMethod.val: “颁布” → 古时颁布的法令有些是刻在竹简上的 → 竹子

trans.tranOther: a tall tropical plant with hollow stems that is used for making furniture
